name: フラッシュポイント
summary: Flash Point is the second in Sega's trilogy of Tetris-centric games, preceded by their own version of Tetris and later followed by Bloxeed. Some players consider Flash Point to be a spiritual predecessor to Tetris with Cardcaptor Sakura Eternal Heart.
info:
• 中文名: 解谜俄罗斯方块
  • 开发: SEGA
  • 发行: SEGA
  • 别名: Flash Point
  • 平台: 街机/Arcade
  • 游戏类型: PUZ
  • 游玩人数: 1-2
  • 发行日期: 1989年
